response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings while ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 14000}
